WorkItem.Description:
Hi,

We are using HTMLAgilityPack to convert HTML to XML (Release 1_4_0).
but we are facing issue with  tag.
we have HTML with li tag as below,

 
   Trauma (sometimes causing cataracts years later)
 
 
   Smoking
 
 
   Alcohol use
 


After converting the above HTML to XML using HTMLAgilityPack, following XML is generated,


 
   Trauma (sometimes causing cataracts years later)
 
   Smoking
 
   Alcohol use
   

why it is happening like this?
I need immediate solutions for this, can any one help me on this?

Sample HTML page: http://www.merckmanuals.com/professional/eye_disorders/cataract/cataract.html
from this link we have produced attached XML.

Thanks and Regards,
Girish Vajrashetti
WorkItem.Summary: Issue with HTML to XML conversion
